MUNTU uuli woonse ulakonzya kusikilwa ntenda. Eeci cilabikkilizya abantu balibonya kuti balivwubide.
IBBAIBBELE LYAAMBA KUTI:
“Teensi basiluno bazunda mukusiyana, teensi basintaze bazunda munkondo, teensi basongo bajana zyakulya, teensi bacenjede bavuba imbono, teensi basimaanu bafwidwa luzyalo, pe. Bantu boonse buyo balasikilwa ziindi zyalufu azyamapenzi.”—Mukambausi 9:11.
Tacikwe makani naa muyoosikilwa ntenda naa pe, pele ciyandika nkuzyiba mbomuyoocita ciindi yaakucitika ntenda eeyo. Mucikozyanyo:
Ino kuti mwasweekelwa zintu zyanu akaambo kantenda iilicitikila?
Ino kuti mwajanwa kuti mulaabulwazi bujaya?
Ino kuti mwafwidwa muyandwa wanu?
Bakamboni ba Jehova, basikumwaya bamagazini eeyi, basyoma kuti Bbaibbele lilakonzya kumugwasya kuliyumya alimwi akumupa bulangizi bwini-bwini ciindi nomwasikilwa ntenda. (Baloma 15:4) Amulange-lange bukkale botatwe butondezya mboligwasya Bbaibbele.

Bwiinguzi bwamu Bbaibbele
Bantu banji baambilwa kuti tatukonzyi kumuzyiba ncobeni wakalemba Bbaibbele. Pele Bbaibbele lilasalazya kwaamba kujatikizya wakalilemba. Zibeela zimwi zilatalika amajwi mbuli aakuti “majwi aa-Nehemiya
,” “cilengano ca-Isaya
,” alimwi aakuti “majwi aa-Jehova aakasika kuli-Joeli.”—Nehemiya 1:1; Isaya 1:1; Joeli 1:1.
Bunji bwabasikulemba Bbaibbele bakazumina kuti bakalemba muzyina lya Jehova, Leza wakasimpe alikke, alimwi akuti bakasololelwa anguwe. Basinsimi ibakalemba Magwalo aa Chihebrayo bakaambilizya ziindi ziinda ku 300 kuti: “Mbuboobu mbwaamba Jehova
.” (Amosi 1:3; Mika 2:3; Nahumu 1:12) Basikulemba bamwi bakautambula mulumbe wa Leza kwiinda mubangelo.—Zekariya 1:7, 9.
Ibbaibbele lyakalembwa abantu bali 40 kwamyaka iinda ku 1,600. Bamwi bakabelesyegwa kulemba mabbuku aamu Bbaibbele aainda ali lyomwe. Masimpe, Bbaibbele nilaibbulali iijisi mabbuku masyoonto-syoonto aali 66. Lijisi Magwalo aa Chihebrayo aali 39, banji ngobaita kuti Cizuminano Cakale, alimwi lijisi mabbuku aa Magwalo aa Banakristo aa Chigiliki aali 27, kanji-kanji aaitwa kuti Cizuminano Cipya.

Kochi wa mu nkambi ya Karongi mu kyalo kya Rwanda wabingishe baana ba sukulu batanu na basatu Bakamonyi ba kwa Yehoba kuba’mba baji na luusa lwa kukasuluka mu bya bupopweshi. Bebapelemo mambo a kukana kufunda bya bupopweshi ku sukulu na mambo a jiwi jabo ja mu muchima.
Masukulu avula mu kyalo kya Rwanda beatangijila ku mabumba a bupopweshi. Ano masukulu amo akambizha baana basukulu kuba’mba bayenga mu chechi wabo ne kupana misonko ya mu chechi. Kutendeka mu 2008 kufika mu 201
... (1203 chars skipped) ... 
ila byatama. Kabiji baana ba sukulu babiji bakomejilepo bebapumenenga amba bo babena kulengela banyike kusatuka. Nangwa kya kuba bebamanyikilenga, bano bonse batanu na basatu kechi basankijilepo byo baitabilamo ne.
Kochi Wabingisha Baana ba Sukulu
Pa 9 June mu 2014, bakapokola popo balekeleko baana ba sukulu batanu na babiji kabiji wajinga mwanyike bingi pa bano bamulekejileko mambo kwi Shabyambo. Nangwa byonkabyo, bakapokola batwajijile kukasa wajinga mukulumpe pa bano pa moba akwabo atanu na a
... (1203 chars skipped) ...
 byo bataibilamo bavilukapo pa ano masukulu. Baana ba sukulu bamo kechi batwajijila kufunda ne, mambo masukulu a bantu aji bingi na mutengo, bansemi babo kechi bakonsha kupana mali ne.
Bansemi Bakamonyi nabo bakeba baana babo kufunda sukulu. Bakeba baana babo kufunda ne kwikala bangikazhi bawama mu kimasamasa. Bakamonyi ba kwa Yehoba baketekela kuba’mba byachibile kochi wa mu nkambi ya Karongi bikalengela masukulu a mu kyalo kya Rwanda kunemeka luusa lwa baana ba sukulu lwa kwisajila bupopweshi.

Lwiiyo lwa Basyaalizi| Muzeezo Wiimpene Kulanganya Cikombelo a Isilayeli
Mumisela yoonse, kuli mizeezo yobile iijatikizya Cikombelo mboceendelana a Isilayeli. Mumuzeezo wa kwaatula Cikombelo caatula cisi ca Israel cakuti cisi ca Israel tacicikwe bulangizi bwakufutulwa. Mumuzeezo wa kuzandulwa (muzeezo wa kupegwa moza), kakuli Yahuwah ucilaa makani kucisi ca Israel, kuli kwiimpana akataa Israel a Cikombelo eeco cikobeledwe mumyaka yoonse, kakwiina kuvwelanya zyobile eezyi.

Amasundo nga Yaleka Ukuwomba
Nga cakuti e koti yalanda ukuti ya-a Amasundo yaleka ukuwomba nu kuti yatazipile nu kuwako, vinji vino vyasyala vino tulanzilepo vyeni vilitwalilila ukuwomba wulyanye. Acino nga cakuti ya-a Amasundo yaleka ukuwomba, wa Watchtower wasikwatapo amaka swinya mutanga muwape umulandu.
Ukuzumilizyanya
Ya-a Amasundo pa vyakuwomvya e webusayiti yitu akuli ukuzumilizyanya pakasi kinu nawa Watchtower swinya yacindime nkaninye.

Undongosi wakisu iki Dr Lazarus Chakwera ikakisye ikomiti ya makambala iyakwendesya ulubatiko lwa mfwa ya gwakibili ku ndongosi wakisu iki Dr. Saulos Chilima.
Ikambala lwakufumusya amasyu Moses Kunkuyu yo ayobaga isi ulu abalinganiaga abina Malawi mumo ifindu fiyilile ukupalamasya nifwa ya Chilima.
Kunkuyu atile mu komiti iyi galimo amakambala kalongo gago gikulongosiwa nikambala lya sya bwanaloli Titus Mvalo.
Mu komiti iyi, balimo kangi abasimbi abakulumba aba fipani fya UTM na MCP, mama Patricia Kaliati na Eisenhower Mkaka.
Amakambala ga mu komiti iyi go aga: Harry Mkandawire, ikambala lya kifigililo, Michael Usi,ikambala lya sya fipeliwa, Simplex Chithyola Banda, ikambala lya sya kyuma, Nancy Tembo, ikambala lyakuketa amasyu ga panja, Khumbize Kandodo Chiponda, ikambala lya sya bumi, Richard Chimwendo Banda, ikambala lyakuketa isya maboma amanandi ni kitukuko kya ntwaya, Ken Zikhale Ng’oma, ikambala lya sya nkisu, Vera Kamtukule, ikambala lyakukoopa abahesya, Moses Kunkuyu ikambala lyakufumusya amasyu kangi Jacob Hara, ikambala lya mendelo ni mbombo.

Kulubula na nsangaji bāni? Muntu yense utanwa ku kupwila kwetu kwa bwine Kidishitu—nka ne balunda netu ba kala bāya. (Lo 15:7; Bah 13:2) Padi i mwanetu mu lwitabijo utambile mu ntanda mikwabo watanwa ku kupwila musunsa wandi mubajinji nansha padi i mwine Kidishitu kakipwilangapo mu bula bwa myaka, waiya monka ku kupwila. Fwatakanya mo keivwanina mu bino bitatyi. Le kukasakepo bakulubule na nsangaji? (Mat 7:12) Ubulwe’po nobe kulonga bukomo bwa kwimuna bakwenu mu Njibo ya Bulopwe pa kushilula nansha pa kupwa kupwila? Kulonga namino kutuntwilanga’ko nsangaji ne buswe kadi kulemekejanga Yehova. (Mat 5:16) Shako, kebikapelapo kwisamba na muntu yense utenwe ku kupwila. Inoko, shi batwe bonso twielele’ko, bonso batenwe’ko bakemona bu abalubulwa biyampe. *
Kizaji kya bine kekilombolwangapo’nka mu bitatyi bya pa bula pamo bwa ku Kivulukilo, ino i mu bitatyi byonso. Beni po bemwena buswe bwa bwine Kidishitu, kebakabulwepo kutumbija Leza ne kwilunga netu mu mutōtelo utōka.—Yoa 13:35.

JW Library nyi programe a kwata buntu ku Internete mulombeene nkukwasha bwa kwata Bible, video, bintu byabadi bakobole penda mayi na ingi mikanda mu telefone, tablete sunga mu ordinatere oobe.
BYA KUMUPETA: Enda ku Internete, otwele pa mbalo ifunde shi: “app store” bwa kwela (installer) JW Library mu telefone, tablete sunga mu ordinatere oobe. Su botwele ku Internete, ofungule mu app store osangule bintu byokumiina kwela mu telefone oobe. Yawa programe a “app store” we kumwela mu telephone, mu tablete sunga mu ordinatere. Abitungu kutwela ku Internete. Su bopu kwata mikanda ku Internete ibatwele mu telefone, mu tablete sunga mu ordinatere oobe, twe na dingi lukalo lwa kutwela ku Internete bwa kwiyibadika. Kadi, bu byabidi shi bakwete kwela mikanda ipya misusa yooso mu JW Library, abitungu wekale otwele ku Internete misusa yooso bwa kutala su kwi bintu bipya.
BWAKINYI KWIKALA NAYE? JW Library akwasha bwa kwilongyela na kulonda bisangilo. Akwasha dingi mu bulungudi. Bikishekishe bulungudi bwa mu mpukapuka.

Yesu wāsangukile mu difuku dya busatu kupwa kwa lufu lwandi. Mu dine difuku’dyo, wāmwekēle balondi bandi misunsa itano mituntulu. Yesu wēbamwekela umbula bwa mafuku 40. Kupwa Yesu wākanda mūlu, papo bandi bana ba bwanga bamobamo babandila. Papita mafuku dikumi, Leza wāpungulwila mushipiditu sandu pa balondi ba Yesu bādi bakunga mu Yelusalema.
Kupwa balwana na Leza bāeleja batumibwa mu kifungo, ino mwikeulu wēbalupula’mo. Mwanā bwanga Shitevani wāipaibwa na kwaswa mabwe na bakinkwa nandi. Ebiya tukafunda muswelo wātongele Yesu kinkwa umo ekale mwingidi wandi wa pa bula, wāikala ke mutumibwa Polo. Penepo, myaka isatu ne kipindi kupwa kwa lufu lwa Yesu, Leza wātuma mutumibwa Petelo akasapwile Konilusa wakubulwa kwikala Muyuda ne kisaka kyandi.
Kupwa kubwipi kwa myaka 13, Polo wāshilula lwendo lwandi lubajinji lwa busapudi. Mu lwendo lwa bubidi, Polo wāenda na Temote. Tusa kufunda mwāikadile Polo ne bendi nandi na bitatyi bivule bilumbuluke mu mwingilo wa Leza. Ku mfulo, Polo wāelwa mu kifungo mu Loma. Bena Isalela byo bajinga mu buzha mu Babilona, lwitabilo lwabo lwaesekelwe bingi. Ba Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego batailwe mu kisha kya mujilo, bino Lesa wibafumishemo batuntulu. Palutwe kacheche panyuma ya kuba Babilona bamushinda ku bena Media ne bena Pelisha, Danyela bamutayile mu jiyengo ja mabokwe, bino Lesa wamuzhikijile kupichila mu kushinka tunwa twa mabokwe.
Kyapeleleko, mfumu wa bena Pelisha aye Kilusa wakuujile bena Isalela. Babwelele ku muzhi wabo panyuma ya kupitapo myaka 70 kufuma po bebatwajile mu buzha mu Babilona. Kintu kitanshi kyo baubile kimye kyo babwelele ku Yelusalema ke kutunga nzubo ya Yehoba. Nangwa byonkabyo, balwanyi bebalekeshe mwingilo wabo. Onkao mambo, bapwishishe kushimika nzubo ya Lesa panyuma ya kupitapo myaka 22 kufuma po babwelejile ku Yelusalema.
Kikwabo, tufunda pa lwendo lwa kwa Ezela lwa kubwela ku Yelusalema na kuwamisha nzubo ya Lesa. Kino kyaubiwe panyuma ya kupitapo myaka 47 kufuma papwijile nzubo ya Lesa. Kepo panyuma ya myaka 13 kufuma pa lwendo lwa kwa Ezela, Nehemiya wakwashishe kushimukulula masakwa a Yelusalema aonaikile. Kipungu kya BUTANU kyaamba pa myaka 152 mu bwikalo bwa bantu kufika ne mu ano moba.

Kani findo ficitwa pa kubungana kwesu?
Bamboni sha baYawe balabungana libili mu mulungu. (AbaEbeya 10:24, 25) Pali kuku ukubungana, uku abali bonse bangasangwako, tulasambilila ifili mu Baibolo ne kubona fyefyo tungafipyungisha mu mekalilo esu.
Mutubeya utwingi utwakupempela kwesu kulaba kwambaala ne bali mwi bumba, koti nifyefyo ciba ku sukuulu. Ukubungana kulatatikila ne lwimbo ne tembelo na pa kushila cilaba fyopele’fyo.
Uuli onse lukoso nangaba ati talipo ni Mboni ya baYawe angasangwako ku kubungana kwesu. Tuleeta bonse lukoso ukweba ati bangasangwako. Tatulipilishapo kabili tatupitamo ili tupoka ifya mpese.

Bantu ba kala abaadi abatembesha kaalo naminyi pabadi mu lwendo?
Mu mukanda wa Kibangilo shapitre a 22, Bible aleesha’shi Efile Mukulu balungwile Abrahame bwadya kwenda ku mbalo i kula na kibundji kyabo mu nkamulambula mulambu wa kushiika. Bible aleesha’shi: “Abrahame nkwata nteete bwa mulambu wa kushiika nkwiyitenteka mwan’aye Isaake; aye nkwata mwiyaasa . . . kaalo na kapete, booso babidi nkwenda pamune.”—Kibangilo 22:6.
Mu Bible ta mbaleeshe kipaso kibabadi abatembesha kaalo kwi bantu ba kala nya. Byabya twi kwamba’shi Abrahame na Isaake abaadi basemune mwengye wa kaalo su? Ungi muntu bambile’shi ta bibaadi bibofule bwa “kusemuna mwengye wa kaalo bwa kwenda nako mbalo i kula nya.” Anka, Abrahame na mwan’aye abaatshile bintu bya kutembesha nabyo kaalo.
Bangi bantu abakula’shi mu aa mafuku tabibaadi bibofule bwa kukasa kaalo. Ngi bwakinyi pakudi mushindo, bantu abaadi abakumina kwata ekala dya kaalo ku kyoto kyabadi bapwe kutembesha, pangi kwa ungi muntu. Bantu bebungi balongye myanda ya mu Bible abakumina’shi Abrahame batshile makala a kaalo ku kyooto kibabadi abooto kumpala kwa kubanga lwendo. Baadi mulombeene kwela anka mu ka kidiba sunga kalondo ka buma kabaadi mwele mooshi, na baadi mwikatwale nsaa ibabadi abende. (Yeeshaya 30:14) Kunyima baadi mwate bikambi na bisama bya mitshi byume bwa kutembesha kaalo mbalo yooso yakumina.

CINO CACINDAMILA: Asambi ya Baibo yalinzile ukuipeela kuli Yeova nu kuwatiziwa pakuti ayatemwe. (1 Pet. 3:21) Nupya Yeova akacingilila ukapepa wa yantu yakwe ndi cakuti vino yakucita vikuvwana na vino yaipeela kuli aliwe. (Masa. 91:1, 2) Umwina Klistu akaipeela kuli Yeova asi uku muntu, ku ncito imwi nanti uku kaungwe kamwi. Acino fwandi asambi yalinzile ukutemelwako Leza alino nu kumutaizya.—Loma 14:7, 8.
VYA KUCITA:
Lino mukusambilila nu musambi, mwalanzyanya pali vino ivyeo vikumusambilizya pali Yeova. Mwamunena sana ukuti awelenga Baibo cila-wanda nu kupepa kuli Yeova “insita zyonsi.”—1 Tesa. 5:17; Yako. 4:8.
Mwakomelezya umusambi ukuti aelenganya sana pa kuipeela nu kuwatiziwa. Nupya mwamwavwa ukuti aalunduluka panono-panono, ivili wa kwasuka pa kulongana nanti ukusimikilako auze alino na yano akaomba nayo. Mwaiusya ukuti Yeova asipatikizya umuntu ali wensi ukumuombela. Umuntu aafwile ukuisolwela umwineco ukuipeela kuli Leza.—Malan. 30:19, 20.
Mwakomelezya umusambi ukuti aazifya imiyele yakwe pakuti aazanzya Yeova alino na pakuti alinge ukuwatiziwa. (Mapi. 27:11) Limwi cingatala sana pakuti umusambi asenuke uku miyele yakwe yonsi, fwandi mungatwalilila ukumwavwa pakuti ate imiyele iipe nu kuya ni miyele isuma. (Efes. 4:22-24) Mungamunenako na pa vipande ivikaya umu Lupungu Lwa Mulinzi apa mutwe wakuti “Baibo Ika-avwa Antu Ukusenuka”
Mwamunenako insansa zino mukakwata mukuombela Yeova.—Eza. 48:17, 18.

Ngimba mukabaghila ukundaghisya mwa kumwambilila kanunu? (Mt 7:12) Ngimba mukabaghila ukufika mwanakalinga panyumba ya Bunyafyale ukuti muponanie nabangi bo ingomano sikali ukwanda pamo pabumalilo? Isi sikutula ukuti paye ulughano kangi sikutwala ulughindiko kwa tata witu Yehova. (Mt 5:16) Nalinga tukabaghila ukumponia aliwesa uyu isile pangomano, loli tukulondiwa ukughelaghela ukuti abahesya bipilikeghe ukuti bambililiwe. *

Mambo ka o twafwainwa kuvulukilanga lufu lwa kwa Yesu?
Lufu lwa kwa Yesu lwanema bingi kufumatu kala kufika ne lelo jino, mambo wafwile kuba’mba bantu bakekale bulongo byonkatu Lesa byo akebelenga. Muntu kechi bamulengele kuba’mba akoobenga bintu byatama, kukolwa nangwa kufwa ne. (Ntendekelo 1:31) Pano bino, bundengamambo bwatwelele pano pa ntanda na mambo a muntu mutanshi, aye Adama. Yesu wapaine bumi bwanji kuba’mba etupokolole ku bundengamambo ne lufu.—Tangai Mateo 20:28; Loma 6:23.
Lesa wamwesheshe butemwe bwanji pa kwitutumina Mwananji pano pa ntanda kuba’mba etufwile. (1 Yoano 4:9, 10) Yesu waambijile baana banji ba bwanga kuvulukanga lufu lwanji kimye kyo baikele na kijiilo kicheche po aingijishe shinkwa ne binyu. Kuba bino pa mwaka pa mwaka kumwesha’mba tusanchila Lesa ne Yesu pa byo betutemwa.—Tangai Luka 22:19, 20.
Bañanyi bafwainwa kujako shinkwa ne kutoma binyu?
Yesu byo abuujile baana banji ba bwanga kuvulukanga lufu lwanji, waambilenga pa lulayañano nangwa’mba mulaye. (Mateo 26:26-28) Kino kyalengela bantu bachechetu kukekala bamfumu ne bañanga pamo nanji mwiulu. Nangwa kya kuba bantu bavula batanwako pa kuvuluka lufu lwa kwa Yesu, bajakotu ku shinkwa ne kutoma binyu ke bonkaba baji mu luno lulayañano.—Tangai Lumwekesho 5:10.
Pa myaka yapitapo nobe 2,000, Yehoba wasala bakekala bamfumu. (Luka 12:32) Bakaya mwiulu bakepa, bakekala pano pa ntanda myaka ne myaka bavula bingi.—Tangai Lumwekesho 7:4, 9, 17.

Yesu balesheeshe myanda ayikakitshi Bufumu bw’Efile Mukulu. Yesu baadi mulungule balongi baaye bwabadya kuteka kufika kwa Bufumu bw’Efile Mukulu na akikyebe eshimba dyaye kikitshikye pa nsenga. (Mateo 6:9, 10) Yesu baadi muleeshe mushindo wabakyebe kwaluula luteko.
Pabaadi kii pano pa nsenga, Yesu baadi mudiishe basha-nsala, nkupaasha basha-mikumbo, na kubuusha bafwe! (Mateo 15:29-38; Yowano 11:38-44) Bu byadi Nfumu a Bufumu bw’Efile mukulu, Yesu baadi muleeshe myanda ibuwa ikale bwabwa Bufumu abukakitshina bantu b’abukamunu.—Bifumbulwe 11:15.
Myanda ayikitshika mu nsenga ayilesha patooka shi Bufumu bw’Efile Mukulu tabudi pepi. Yesu baadi mutemukye shi, mafuku apeela kumpala kwashi Bufumu bufwishe butaale pa nsenga, nsenga ayikala iule na ngoshi, nsala, na kutshinkatshinka kwa nsenga.—Mateo 24:3, 7.
Tukwete kumona yaaya myanda yooso lelo uno. Byabya twi balombeene kwikala na lukulupilo shi Bufumu bw’Efile Mukulu abukyebe kufudiisha ino myanda yooso mu mafuku apeela.

Bushe kuti mwatila shani?
IFYA MWEO FYONSE․․․․․.
FYASANGWIKE FYE IFINE
KWALI UWA FIBUMBILE
ABANTU bamo bamona kwati umuntu uwasambilila sana kuti atila ifintu “fyasangwike fye ifine,” e lyo uwatemwa ifya mapepo ena kuti atila ifintu fyonse “kwali uwa fibumbile.”
Nomba ifyo te fyo ciba lyonse iyo.
Profesa uwasambilila pa fya mweo, Rama Singh, uwaba pa McMaster University iyaba ku Canada, atile: “Abalanda ukuti ifintu tafyasangwike fye te balya fye abatemwa ifya mapepo, lelo na bantu fye abengi abasambilila nabo e fyo balanda.”
Moneni ifyalandile profesa wa tushishi, Gerard, uo basambilishe ku koleji ukuti ifintu fyasangwike fye. Atile: “Ilyo nalelemba amashindano, nalelemba ifyo bakafundisha balefwaya nomba nshaficetekele.”
Nomba mulandu nshi bamo abasambilila sana bakaanina ukusumina ukuti ifintu fyasangwike fye? Pa kuti twasuke ici cipusho, natulande pa mepusho yabili ayo basayantisti bafilwa ukwasuka: (1) Bushe ifya mweo fyaishilebako shani? na (2) Bushe ifya mweo fyalealuka shani pa kusanguka icintu cimbi?
